hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/sh -l set -e pw=${ES_PASS} month=`date -d '-1 day' +%m` echo "logstash-2022$month.$t started">> /home/xia/es_to_obs/trans.log t=0 for i in `date -d '-1 day' +%d` do t=$i echo "logstash-2022$month.$t start" NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 /usr/local/bin/elasticdump --input=https://admin:$pw@119.8.111.61:9200 --input-index=logstash-2022.$month.$t --output=/mnt/mount_path/logstash-2022.$month.$t-hk-app.json --searchBody '{"query": {"terms": {"vhost.keyword": ["repo.openeuler.org","openeuler.org","www.openeuler.org","mailweb.openeuler.org"]}}}' --type=data --maxSockets=4 --timeout=60000 --retryAttempts=10 --retryDelay=30000 --limit=1000 echo "logstash-2022$month.$t finished"
done
